xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: docbook:load
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: docbook:load($node as node(), $model as map, $q as xs:string?, $doc as xs:string?, $field as xs:string) as item()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Load a docbook document. If a query was specified, re-run the query on the document to get matches highlighted.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: docbook:to-html
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: docbook:to-html($node as node(), $model as map) as item()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Transform the docbook fragment given in $model.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: docbook:toc
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: docbook:toc($node as node(), $model as map) as item()*
